sf68:4: “pṛccha Bodha d eva yad yad evākāṁkṣasi.”
sf68:5: “katibhir bhadaṁtāṁgaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti?”
sf68:6: “tena hi Bodha tvām eva pra + + yathā te  kṣamate ’thainam vyākuru! kiṁ manyase Bodha kuśalas tvaṁ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahepāśagrahe  toramaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ?”
sf68:7: “tathyam ahaṁ bhadanta kuśalaḥ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhasti-grīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahetomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyām.”
sf68:8: “atha puruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rājakumāraḥ pitryeśilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe saraudhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv aham asyāntikād anyatamānyatamaśilpasthānakarmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti
sf68:9: sa ca syād aśrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
sf68:11: “sa ca syāc chaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tadṛ śaṭhīna prāptavyanprāpnuyāt sa?”
sf68:13: “sa ca syād bahvābādhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt saḥ?”
sf68:15: “sa ca syād anārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?”
sf68:17: “sa ca syād duṣprajñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
sf68:18: “no bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa na sukaraṁ mamāntikād anyatamānyatamaṁ śilpasthāna-karmasthānam anvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ.”
sf68:19: “dvitīyo .āpuruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rāja-kumāraḥ pitrye  śilpasthānakarmmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyāṁ aśva-pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahelipigaṇananyasanaṁsaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv aham asyāntikād anyata-mānyatamac chilpasthānakarmmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti.
sf68:20: sa ca syāc chrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
sf68:22: “sa ca syād aśaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha:  yat tad aśaṭhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
sf68:24: “sa ca syād alpābādhaḥ; kim manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
sf68:26: “sa ca syād ārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase  Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?” “evaṁ bhadanta.”
sf68:27: “sa ca syāt prājñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyātsa?”
sf68:28: “evaṁ bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena  samanvāgatena tenapuruṣeṇa sukaraṁ mamāntikād anyatamānyatamac chilpasthānakarmasthānasamanvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvair.”
sf68:29: “evam eva Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥkṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti; katamaiḥ paṁcabhir?
sf68:30: iha Bodha āryaśrāvakasya tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhiniviṣṭābhavatimū lajātāpratiṣṭhitāasaṁhāryāśramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmatam; anena prathamenaprādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
sf68:31: punar aparaṁ + Bodha āryaśrāvako ’śaṭhībhavaty amāyāvīṛjukoṛjukajātīyaḥ sa yathābhū tam ātmānam āviṣkaroti śāstur antike vijñānāṁ casabrahmacārīṇām anena dvitīyena prādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgatobhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
sf68:32: punar aparaṁ āryaśrāvaka alpābādho bhavaty arogajātīyaḥ samayāpācanyāgrahaṇyāsamanvāgato nātyuṣṇayā  nātiśītayāavyābādhayāṛtusukhāyāyayāpy aśitapītakhaditāsvāditāni samyaksukhena paripākaṁ gacchanti; anenatṛtīyena prādhānikāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty ābhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
sf68:33: punar aparaṁ Bodha āryaśrāvakaḥ ārabdhavīryo viharati sthāmavāṁ vīryavānutsāhīdṛḍhaparākramo ’nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu: kāmaṁ tvak snāyvasthi  cāvatiṣṭhatāṁ, pariśuṣyatu śarīrān māṁsaśoṇitam. atha ca punar yattad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṁ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tad vata nāprāpyāntarādvīryasya sraṁsanaṁ bhaviṣyaty; anena caturthena prādhānikenāṁgena samana-vāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
sf68:34: punar aparaṁ Bodhāryaśrāvakaḥ  prajñāvān viharati lokasyodayāstaṁgaminyāprajñayāsamanvāgataḥ āryayānairyāṇikayānairvedhikayāniryātitatkaraḥ sya hetoḥ samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai; anena paṁcamena prādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
sf68:35: ebhir Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgataḥ āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipramevāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti.”
sf68:36: atha Bodho rājakumāraḥ pū rvaṁ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṁ bāhumabhiprasāryāttamanāttamanāudānam udānayati: “aho buddha aho dharma ahosaṁgha aho dharmasya  svākhyātatā, yatredānīṁ paṁcabhiḥ prādhāni-kāṁgenagaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinayeāsravakṣayam anuprāpnotīti!”
